description: LPG, petrol pump and laundry for laundry. lots of shops nearby.

description: Large paved esplanade, neighborhood parking and some driving school, we spent a quiet night 15 minutes from the center.

title: (29601) Marbella - 9 juan alameda
description: Public parking in soil in the area near the old town of Marbella. Only for small cars,access very difficult for campers

title: (29603) Marbella - 43 Calle José Manuel Vallés
description: Large parking lot to park! Sea 5 minutes walk and historic center about fifteen minutes walk. Ditto for visiting Marvel la! Free parking but inaccessible on Mondays because market day. We didn't spend the night there.

title: (29603) Marbella - 190A Polígono Industrial la Ermita
description: Least expensive gas station in the area. Refill with drinking water possible.

title: (29603) Marbella - 20 Avenida Severo Ochoa

title: (29601) Marbella - 22 Calle del Calvario

title: (29602) Marbella - parcela 10 Camino de los Pescadores
title_short: (29602) Marbella - parcela 10 Camino de los Pescadores
description: Just a few minutes from Marbella center, huge place to park, all types of vehicles. Sunset in the mountains

title: (29601) Marbella - 31 Avenida Cánovas del Castillo
description: Good place for barbecues. There is a gravel esplanade to park the motorhome. There is no service except for a few sinks to be able to wash the personal belongings of the barbecues. You can't stay all night!

title: (29601) Marbella - 19 Avenida Picasso
description:
Parking under trees, with children's play area and sports activities tenis climbing wall .. a bar restaurant with sanitary facilities. at the entrance shower and toilet.

Public parking of the sports center, ideal for Ac and small vans, ours of 7m only looked next to the bicycle parking (1 place) but cars do not pass ... Good place close to everything, we do everything on foot, of course you have to walk a little but it is done well.
Respect the site so that it is not taken away from us

title: (29600) Marbella - 340 Calle Capitan Andres Becerra
description: Service station where you can load water and propane. Very friendly and helpful staff. To carry water you need a hose, they don't have it. In gratitude we made a purchase at your supermarket. The boss thought it was a good idea to publish his establishment in this App. So if you come by, tell him that you have seen it here. Thank you

title: (29602) Marbella - 20 Conjunto Residencial los Montoros
description: Parking behind the school and next to the entrance to the network of paths facing south Sierra Blanca the monks at the entrance of the path there is a small stream

title: (29602) Marbella - 15 Calle Camilo José Cela
description: Free on street parking in the upmarket hotel area, appeared very safe and no restrictions that we encountered, this was over new year's and we stayed for three nights with no trouble, there were other vans there too.

title: (29602) Marbella - 4 Calle Diez de Oñate
description: Ideal parking if you come to participate in the CxM Sierra Blanca trail. Very quiet residential area and 10 minutes from downtown. There are supermarkets nearby.

title: (29602) Marbella - 10 Calle Estébanez Calderón
description: Potable water

title: (29602) Marbella - 416 Urbanización el Capricho
description: Free quiet parking for large campers behind the supermarket

title: (29602) Marbella - 3 N-340
description: Site behind him English court to park

title: (29602) Marbella - C.C Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
title_short: (29602) Marbella - C.C Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
description: Free parking, it is attached to the road with a lawn separating it, the cars are heard at night but it compensates for the great shade that the big trees give in the morning, we were there for a whole day and a night without problem, gas station 24 hours at 300 meters that you can walk through any deviation.

address.street: C.C Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe

title: (29603) Marbella - 2 Camino del Pinar
description: Private car park about 300m from Pinillo Canine beach. Access by wooden walkway to the beach itself. You will find there the public shower and toilets (quite clean) and even a dog shower. The parking lot is a bit run down but they let me in with the van. I advise against parking in the first area because there is a lot of elevation on the right towards the exit, there is another descent where you can access a second level parking area.

title: (29602) Marbella - 7 Calle Roy Boston
description: I LOVE this place! When traveling around alone as a young girl, being safe is very important. Even though this is just a parking spot by the street, I felt safe at all times! It’s right outside a hotel and there was other campers near by. I didn’t pay anything for parking (3 nights) and it’s a 5 min walk down to the beautiful beach. 15 min walk to central Marbella. I truly have nothing to complain about, it was perfect!

title: (29602) Marbella - 6 Urbanización la Virginia
description: Rough land parking area. Access okay for 8m van. Road leading to this area looks fairly tight, but it is fine

title: (29602) Marbella - 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
title_short: (29602) Marbella - 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
description: The car park is right behind Carrefour .. there were other campers parked. The supermarket closes at 22 so it is the ideal place to leave the camper and take a ride in the center .. there is the bus right in front (lidl side). I think you can stay overnight without any problems.

address.street: 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe

title: (29602) Marbella - 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
title_short: (29602) Marbella - 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
description: Parallel parking next to the superSol supermarket in Marbella. Idea for visiting the city. You have the supermarket next door to buy what you need. It is asphalted and with very little slope. On the one hand, there are trees that give you shade. It is very noisy, the avenue which passes next to it has a lot of traffic.  During the opening hours of the supermarket, you have access to public toilets. The beach is a 10 minute walk away. At 100 meters there is a bus stop to go to the center of Marbella or Puerto Banus.

address.street: 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe

title: (29602) Marbella - 179 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
title_short: (29602) Marbella - 179 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
description: Place for 3 campers

address.street: 179 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe

title: (29603) Marbella - 4 Urbanización Golf Río Real
description: An off-road parking space for 5/6 campers on the outskirts … near a villa. Quiet place ideal for walking with animals, traking, mountain biking ... there are no services around but excellent for staying overnight for a few days, safe and quiet.

title: (29603) Marbella - 191F Arrabal P Golf Rio Real
title_short: (29603) Marbella - 191F Arrabal P Golf Rio Real
description: We managed to get our Swedish propane bottles filled here! But this is just a parking lot we’re is the meeting point! You have to call the guy and book a time to meet up! We had this place as a meeting point! He arrived in his car took our 2 bottles and filled them and got back 2 hours later! It’s expensive but so hard here in Spain to get our Swedish bottles filled! We paid 40 euro for a big bottle and 30 for a smaller! Think they called p11 & p10. But remember to call him maby 1-2 days before! Around 17-18 in the afternoon is a good time to call and his number is availble to Pro users.   We were very glad and recommend him if you have a hard time filling your bottles here in Spain! Also I can recommend the really nice restaurant Trocadero! Kind of expensive around 20-25 euro pp but verynice

title: (29602) Marbella - 1A Avenida Piedramar
description: A quiet and incredible area to park and stay for a couple of days! I stayed here for about 5 days, there are not many people, they come to walk with the dogs and then they leave. Clean and shady place! I have two dogs and it was amazing for us!

title: (29602) Marbella - 175 Urbanización Marbella Sierra Blanca
description: Free outdoor parking, near Starlite Marbella, public and unguarded.

title: (29603) Marbella - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Service area with large parking lots and restaurant

title: (29600) Marbella -
description: CÁDIZ address service area with ample specific parking for trucks and motorhomes. Restaurant / cafeteria, ideal to stop for lunch, have a coffee or stretch your legs, very friendly staff.

title: (29610) Ojén - 7 Arrabal Ue. 4
description: Parking in unpaved area

title: (29610) Ojén - Paseo del Acebuchal
description: Large parking lot for the night. Without any services but quiet is at the entrance of Ojèn. Very quiet village and beautiful viewpoints. advisable to have a good day.

title: (29610) Ojén - 5 Calle Almeria
description: Land, quiet parking for the night. Ideal for visiting the city and visiting the countryside caves and columns.

title: (29610) Ojén - 10 Calle Miro
description: Small plateau on the outskirts of Ojén, easy to reach via the access road with a turning manoeuvre, the course itself is also much easier to access than the one next to it, as the incline is much lower. Ideal for exploring Ojén. Locals also park there, we didn't stay overnight

title: (29610) Ojén - 329 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking sorounded by nature.  A bit of car noise from the road can be heard.

title: (29610) Ojén - 5 Camino del Almorquin
description: Small esplanade in the center of town, we have spent the night very quiet and very beautiful views

title: (29602) Marbella -
description: It is the straight of a street like with stores and dealerships. A little further on there is an aldi. To visit Puerto Banus, about 25 minutes walk. During the day without problem, to spend the night too much circulation.

title: (29602) Marbella - 107A Urbanización Villa Parra
description: Parking spaces in a quiet street. 20 minutes walk from the port.

title: (29602) Marbella - N 340
description: Free parking next to the Aldi, I come with a camperized boxer van and the truth is that I have no problems. Enjoy Marbella

title: (29602) Marbella - 109A Urbanización Villa Parra
description: Day parking lot wide enough to park along the street ideally located near Aldi we stayed there for lunch with a 6m80 motorhome without problem

title: (29602) Marbella - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Rest area on westbound turnpike, relatively quiet, good place to crash once on the road.

title: (29604) Marbella - 4 Pl de los Tamarindos
description: Parking for day and night quiet next to the beach

title: (29660) Marbella - 4 Calle los Granados
description: public free parking lot. No prohibition signs. This morning there was a man in a yellow parkman's jacket, I spoke to him myself and he said I should give what I thought was right...;). There are public toilets and a restaurant on the beach across the bridge. In addition to my Caddy, a sprinter also stayed overnight.

title: (29610) - 45 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking en face du "Refugio del juanar" accessible pour les vans. 2 à 3 places  planes. Le parking était tranquille.  En pleine nature...

title: (29660) Marbella - 25 Calle los Granados
description: Parking in a quiet street. A dead end road so not much traffic. Very short walk to the beaches with toilets and cycle trail, and Puerto Banus.

title: (29660) Marbella -
description: Small dirt parking lot for about 10 Camper or CamperVan type vehicles. 10 min walk from Banus and Portobanus beach.

title: (29660) Marbella - 60 Avenida de las Naciones Unidas
title_short: (29660) Marbella - 60 Avenida de las Naciones Unidas
description: Right on the beach and harbor of Marbella's upscale Puerto Banus. In the morning, it is easiest to find a parking space

name: Camping La Buganvilla
title: (29604) Camping La Buganvilla
description:
Marbella, Autovia del Mediterraneo.
Camping La Buganvilla 1 km from the beach and 6 km from the center of Marbella. Very nice campsite with swimming pool. free wifi at the bar

We settled in this campsite
for two nights. a little expensive for the place because the pitches are not really flat and we have to take the 4 lanes to access Marbella.
Impossible when cycling.

title: (29604) Marbella -
description: Pine forest next to the Buganvilla campsite, in Marbella, 3 min from the beach, lots of shade, no services

title: (29611) Istán - 59 Terreno Sau
description: Next to the road to Istan from estepona. During day busy, night was quiet. Beatiful view

title: (29604) Marbella - 17 Avenida Andasol
description: Small asphalt or ground parking with public shower and a chiringuito next door. There is a problem at the end of the street, right on the beach is prohibited the circulation of vehicles and parking, but in the street that leads to the beach, in the urbanizations if you can park, although as you get closer to the beach the unevenness is very pronounced.

title: (29604) Marbella - 2 Urbanización Pinomar
description: A gas station with a self service laundry. Also a car wash and an ATM.

title: (29604) Marbella - 1 Urbanización Alvarito Playa
description: New car park. 200 m from the sea. 10 parking spaces. right.

title: (29660) Marbella - 4A Urbanizacion Nva Andalucia Aloha
description: Large vacant lot, flat, located between residences, not overlooked. No services. A large tree for shade. We spent 2 nights there in the middle of the season without a hitch. Garbage cans and restaurants nearby. Pleasant place for the night but far from the city center and the beaches.

title: (29660) Marbella - 28 Urbanizacion N Andalucia L
description: Lovely place with lake, playground and picnic area. Perfect to spend the day with the kids and rest

title: (29660) Marbella - 18 Urbanizacion N Andalucia 8H

title: (29660) Marbella - 68 Calle el Califa
description: Another comfortable parking for Banús. 20 minutes walk from the port

title: (29604) Marbella - 202 Urbanización Alvarito Playa
description: Free parking, not very quiet in the summer, a few meters from the beach

title: (29610) Ojén - MA-5300
description: Big open space at the side of the road. No services, just a nice spot with nice mountainbike trails in the neighbourhood and good hiking

title: (29660) Marbella - 2 Calle Real
description: The most comfortable thing we found to visit Puerto Banús. 20 minutes walk from the port

title: (29604) Marbella - 69 Conjunto Ciudad Residencial Tiempo Libre
title_short: (29604) Marbella - 69 Conjunto Ciudad Residencial Tiempo Libre
description: A large, slightly sloping gravel car park with sea views. The beach is less than a 5-minute walk away. In the surroundings (about 600 m) you will find a Mercandona with toilet, a Lidl and, in the opposite direction, a service station with laundry and toilet. We also discovered a German speaking veterinarian around the corner because we wanted to continue in Morocco. I stayed a week and had no problem. I felt safe and it was still very hot in early November.

title: () Marbella -
description: Beautiful place overlooking the lake and a mountain, on the right you can see the sea. Made the way without a 4x4, but you're definitely on the safe side with one. Treat nature with respect!

title: (29660) Marbella - C. Lago Constanza
description: Magnificent view of the lake. Access for 4x4 on fairly flat ground. Space for 3 vehicles max.

title: (29611) Istán -
description: Open parking space, with trash bins. Departure point for hikes. Just next to the road.

title: (29611) Istán - 105 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Small parking at the entrance of the Sierra Nieves. quiet little road in the nature and near the municipal swimming pool. Good for a night.

title: (29660) Marbella - 3 Arrabal a Cañas
description: Parking with wide sidewalk behind, quiet residential area. At the foot of the highway, it is not a place to spend the night (because of the noise). Ideal to visit on foot the area of ​​Puerto Banús, about 20 minutes on foot.

title: (29600) Marbella -
description: Beautiful places to spend the night !!! On the other hand, have a good 4X4 to access it

description: Public parking on foot of the hotel istan Quiet night, slight inclination. In the morning a lot of truck noise. Ideal for overnight and to start trail

title: () Ojén - Unnamed Road
description: Nice spot at almost 1000m altitude with a great panoramic view of the sea and the mountains. Located at the foot of a high voltage line. The slopes to go up there are very very steep.

description: Llanos de Purla Recreation Area

description: 4 places, mountain, ground, level for motor homes of 6,30m maximum. Continuation of the conversation between the public parking and the car parks, as well as the guided tour of the city and the restoration of the city.

title: (29604) Marbella - 1 Calle Picasso
description: Nice parking really quiet even in July-August. But be discreet and do not go out chairs or towels. Lidl at 5 minutes. by bike. Showers, deckchairs and small snack / bar (closes at 22:30 in high season) Ideal for a van.

title: (29610) Ojén -
description: A larger space just before the one on the antenna, much easier to reach and much less scratches on the vehicle due to overgrown vegetation. still nice view :)

title: (29611) Istán - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place

title: (29660) Marbella - 25B Ventura del Mar
description: Parking at the edge of the beach, with shaded areas. The street hardly has any traffic. In front of the promenade that leads to Puerto Banús and San Pedro de Alcántara.

description: Quiet parking near the beach.

title: (29660) Marbella - S/N Calle Quevedo
description: Two-way avenue with plenty of parking (we arrived on Saturday afternoon). School area and sports center nearby, about 2 or 3 kilometers from the beach (of stones). Close to several popular places.

description: Parking near the sea with shower to rinse off

description: Ideal medium quiet parking campers supermarkets bars etc at 1 minute, seems safe

title: (29604) Marbella - 1 Urbanización Marbella del Este
description: Small Parking Area directly on the beach. Cold Showers on  the beach available. Public Toilets are closed in off season. these place is maybe better for smaller vans.

title: (29670) Marbella - 2E Lugar Urbanizacion Nueva Alcantara
description: Quiet place, according to a couple who comes here regularly, it is the tourist office who told them that we can stay here. The beach is a 5 minute walk away. There are no houses and the places are level. This weekend we were 4 motorhomes.

description: drinking water source

title: (29670) Marbella - 42 Lugar Urbanizacion Nueva Alcantara
description: Perfect for sleeping

title: (29670) San Pedro Alcántara - 54 Avenida Oriental
description: It is at the entrance of San San Pedro, you can walk everywhere, near banks, shops, supermarkets, bars, etc. It has no service, it is a flat land where it parks. In front there is a park with fountains and litter bins, very close there are also garbage cans

title: (29604) Marbella - 15 Avenida Marbella del Este
description: Large, spacious parking lot with shade, only some noise from the road

title: (29670) Marbella - 8V Lugar Urbanizacion Nueva Alcantara
description: Parking for rest near the beach. In summer crowded. Without water services or discharge.

title: (29604) Marbella - 3 Rancho Park
description: Day parking on the beach, with beautiful sea views, close to beach bars. The beach has a bit of rock, but that's fine.

title: (29670) Marbella - 2 Arrabal PASP11
description: Self-service laundry

title: (29678) Marbella -
description:
Bumpy and dusty road. But at the end you will find peace.

Dirt road along the river Guadaiza with plenty of places to camp along the river or at the end by the small lake. Calm and peaceful place, some MTB and dog walkers pass by.

Do a hike in the river with the fishes and turtles! Not allowed to swim in the lake, also no pets. But locals bring their dogs and let them swim.

title: (29670) Marbella - 4P Carretera de Ronda
description: Plain sand, is large and is at different heights, at the entrance of San Pedro, round direction. In front there is a King burguer (with wifi and WC) nearby there is a laundry, bars, banks and supermarkets (behind the burguer King)

title: (29670) Marbella - 263 Calle los Eucaliptos
description: Great and safe place just a few steps from the beach and a big promenade.  Showers, water and WC at the beach.

title: (29670) San Pedro Alcántara -
description: Self-service laundry at gas station, no problem for parking

title: (29670) Marbella - 1E Urbanización Linda Vista Playa
description: Land parking on the beachfront. It does not have services but it has a beach bar next to it and bins.  Very close to the promenade and less crowded.

title: (29604) Marbella - 454A Urbanización Marbesa
description: Large parking without any service. Places shared with those of the Simbad restaurant. Direct access to the beach. Sign at the entrance with no transit for work vehicles (light vehicles) more than 5m.

title: (29670) San Pedro de Alcántara -
description:
A large but not massive parking area under the tall trees that should provide plenty of shade in the warmer months. The ground is a mixture of gravel and dirt and it looks like it could support big motorhomes even if it rains. There's plenty of space and good access tarmac/gravelly road.
Facilities;
Wakeboard / waterski Cable Park, (you should be able to use the shower there and get a bit to eat at their restaurant /bar, maybe sunbathe on their lawns, there is also a pool.
Golf club with bar
Walking is perfect for dog owners. And the area is visited by locals walking there dogs.
I also stumbled upon this BMX /  MTB track
I had a very quiet stay from 2 days at the weekend in Mid November it was nice to get away from the extreme windy weather and shelter here.

title: (29604) Marbella -
description: A good and quiet place to spend the night

title: (29604) Marbella - 8 Urbanización Carib Playa
description:
A parking right in front of the sea. 
parking tranquilo fuera de temporada de verano. al lado de un restaurante

title: (29110) Monda - 367 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Quiet area outside the town where there is a fountain to fill the tanks.

title: (29110) Monda - 79 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Perfect for a meal or to spend the night

title: () Marbella - Unnamed Road
description: Potable source, exceptional pressure and easy access road. It's not in the area at all, but still a nice area to wander around.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: There are quite a few little areas like this along the road.  We stayed here because it was just out of sight of Marbella.  The surrounding hills are covered in there's and we could get a few metres away from the ,not too busy, road.

title: (29110) Monda - s/n Camino Hoyanca
description: In Monda. Near the road that connects Coin with Marbella. It is a parking lot for a design school. Desert in summer. There are 2 security cameras (but no alarm function). The highway ends in that parking lot and a farm, nobody is disturbed.

name: Camping Cabopino
title: (29604) Camping Cabopino
description: Marbella, Urbanization Artola Alta 4. Cabopino Camping

title: (29604) Marbella - 1N Urbanización Cabopino
description: Free public parking right on the beach next to a beautiful nature reserve. Beware, there is a scam on the way, who wants to collect parking fees. Don't pay!!! Longer stays are NOT allowed. On weekends the parking lot is packed.

title: (29604) Marbella - 272 Urbanización Jardines del Puerto
description: Laundromat at the Shell petrol station. 3 x 8 kg 2 x 14 kg 4 x dryer All 30 minutes each. Coins are required, which are available at the gas station. See photo for prices.

title: (29678) Marbella - 304 Calle 9A
description: Very quiet place right on the beach. Next to a golf course. Driveway is a bit greasy, however, because damn narrow. Maximum 2.30 m in width passage. No height limit. But definitely not suitable for mobile homes. This narrow driveway is also in a one-way street. No chance to go back then. It was exhausting, but I just made it with a van / van 6.50 m long and folded mirrors.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Camino al Caserío de las Máquinas
title_short: (29679) Benahavís - Camino al Caserío de las Máquinas
description: Parking departure from hiking. Lets park a little behind the road. Noisy anyway because a lot of traffic in the summer until late at night and early in the morning.

address.street: Camino al Caserío de las Máquinas

title: (29110) Monda - 7B Calle Higuera
description:
Parking in the center of the city. Important. It is shared with cars, it is usually quite busy during the day, Tuesday is market day until 2pm so avoid the area at all costs.

You are OK to park for one night, however, not for large motor homes as it is a small but bustling village.

There are water fountains in the village where you can fill up your water bottles and have a little tapa!

title: (29604) Marbella -
description: Parking next to Cabo pino, facing the beach.

title: (29688) Estepona - 27 Urbanización Nueva Atalaya
description: Good place to spend a night. Without services, bakery, cafeteria, supermarket, very close. There are shady areas, very quiet at night.

title: (29679) Benahavís - A 7175
description: On the by-passed old road A-7175 just in front of the Ermita Virgen del Rosario. Nice flat tarmac area, plenty of space. Walkers and hikers during the day but quiet at night. In very nice countryside.

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 70 Avenida de España
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 70 Avenida de España
description: A public parking lot next to a park with a children's playground. The sea is a 3-minute walk away, Lidl is a 2-minute walk away and various restaurants are just a stone's throw away. Lots of shade, many parked cars during the day, but completely empty and quiet at night. We slept here for 2 nights without any problems

title: (29688) El Paraíso - 22 Calle de Sabinillas
description: Large parking area with leafy trees that provide good shade. Unpaved gravel floor. During the day there are parked cars of workers from the nearby offices and shops. At night very quiet. A lot of noise from the highway too close. But supermarkets and services nearby and nobody tells you anything.

title: (29679) - 1 Arrabal Sg. 1
description: We parked here for the night, super quiet, right by the river. We were the only camping car here, no facilities but this village is super cute, fantastic park for young children (ours were 6 and 3), with a cafe inside it.

title: (29679) Benahavís -
description: There are lots of spots to park all along this road (including others marked on Park4night already). We stayed here as it is a bit set back from the road and less visible. It is a small area to pull into behind some trees - it can be hard to see the entrance so go slowly round the corner. There is space for 2-3 small vans and there is a nice view down to the sea.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Calle la Rivera
description: Nicely designed parking lot in front of the soccer field with a few larger parking spaces. Good place to spend the night. It's quiet even if there is a road next to it. At the entrance to the dog park there is a tap with drinking water.

name: Camping Los Jarales
title: (29649) Camping Los Jarales
description:
Campsite Los Jarales in Mijas Costa. The squares of approximately 60m2 are all equipped with water and electricity. There is a playground and in the summer a swimming pool. Showers and toilets in good condition. Two washing machines available, no dryer.
Wi-Fi. Dogs are welcome.

title: (29679) Benahavís - 1B Calle Molino
description: Faucet with good pressure and with no screw.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Calle Camino del Molino
description:
Near a water plan
some Walker, very quiet
no Swiming
leave this place clean

title: (29649) Calahonda - 27 Calle San Wenceslao de Calypso
title_short: (29649) Calahonda - 27 Calle San Wenceslao de Calypso
description: Easily accessible washing machine from the road with parking that is usually overcrowded in high season. Rest of the year no problem. Supermarket very close.

title: (29679) Benahavís - A-397
description: Parking on a relatively busy road. Great view but also street noise.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Unnamed Road
description: I found this place during my hike. Its near an abandoned building and it is peaceful and quiet here. It had good views and you are close to Benahavis but in nature.

title: (29649) Calahonda - 165 Calle Olivo
description: Self-service laundry, washing and drying, all included.

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 38A Urbanizacion UR11
description: Excellent starting point for visiting the river in the canyon with pools of water "barranco blanco"

title: (29688) Saladillo Benamara - Calle Sotavento
description: Superb parking spaces by the sea, access to the beach showers. Very quiet, super residential area.

title: (29688) Estepona - 98 Carretera Nacional N-340
description: Large car park next to Lidl and Mecadona.No height or lenght restriction.Free of charge day/night.Next to motorway A7 but quiet at night with few traffic passing.Great for one night and grocery shopping.Close to beach and restaurants.

title: (29108) Guaro -
description: Little picnic spot on the side of the road. No signs and looks like allowed to sleep over. Little noisy with the road next to but very quite road in general so.

title: (29100) Coín - 2 Lugar Partido Pereila Alta
description: Large parking lot at the church.

title: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - Calle Adriano
title_short: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - Calle Adriano
description: Very quiet location at the end of the street, 20 meters from the beach. Security that runs every 20 minutes. No service. Walking. The night illuminated.

title: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - 39 Calle Jorge
title_short: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - 39 Calle Jorge
description: Small spot with sea view, you have to go through a small dirt road (it's quite tight, we narrowly passed with a van, transport). Direct access to the sea, short walk on both sides which gives access to showers and toilets (on the left facing the sea).

title: (29100) Málaga - 181 Lugar Partido Valdeperales
description: In the middle of a large forest, surrounded by pine trees, next to a football stadium. Very quiet at night. Along the GR 249. No facilities, but there is a water point at the entrance to the stadium. There is plenty of space to park. Be careful, do not follow the GPS here because it indicates closed or impassable paths by van or CC. On the MA-3303, south of the interchange with the A-355, take the small road towards "Nacimiento" and "Ciudad Deportivo". The 3rd path on the left leads to the "Ciudad Deportivo", but the official path, with a sign at the crossroads, is further: continue on the small road following the signs "Ciudad Deportivo" There is a mountain bike center nearby and tracks in the woods. Also a riding place near Nacimiento.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Arrabal Ue C9
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Arrabal Ue C9
description: Gas station with LPG. shop, bread. car wash station, compressed air.

title: (29680) Estepona - 1 Calle Ganges
description: Nice parking lot by the sea in hardly visited dead end street.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 2A Urbanización las Mimosas
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 2A Urbanización las Mimosas
description:
Parking along the highway, so it's noisy. But if your here for a couple of hours of skimboarding or surfing it's a good place to stay.

If your coming in from the highway there is no height restriction. But if your come via the side road and under the highway the hight is 2.70m

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Urbanización Jardín Butiplaya
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Urbanización Jardín Butiplaya
description: Laundromat, very well maintained!

title: (29109) Tolox - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful view, next to a water reservoir. Can be quite windy. Guardia Civil drove by for a chat

title: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - 64 Calle Guadalmansa
title_short: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - 64 Calle Guadalmansa
description: Nice quiet place on the beach - sand and pebbles. Your navigation might say it's not possible to get there - it is. Space for Two to four vans directly on the beach and more space a bit in the back. No services, no restaurants. Some Buildings are under construction nearby so maybe not so quiet anymore in the future. There were about five vans/motorhomes here in January.

title: (29680) Estepona - 7 Urbanización Playa Guadalmansa
description: Super place for motorhomes, the shower is located on the beach farther away 40m.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Arrabal C13
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Arrabal C13
description: Gas station with free water point.

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 29 Urbanizacion UR9
description: Large and quiet car park, nice views, the noise from the road can be heard very lightly. It looks like a kind of maze, you can drive even further down. It appears to be under construction with open manhole covers here and there, so drive carefully. There is a forest on the other side of the road where you can go for a walk. 30 minutes from Málaga.

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 5C Arrabal Sg C5
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 5C Arrabal Sg C5
description: Exhibition center, Mijas Bay. Quiet and safe, just ten minutes from the beach. Ideal for walks along the Calahonda waterfront and to the island of Marbella. Large flat concrete carpark.

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 4 Avenida Abogados de Oficio
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 4 Avenida Abogados de Oficio
description: Water

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 28 Calle Butibamba
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 28 Calle Butibamba
description: Shower. Also in operation in winter.

title: (29109) Tolox - s/n Avenida Balneario
description: Nice quiet place and perfect for hiking. A policeman came by and even allowed me to stay overnight. There are picnic areas, water, rubbish bins and you can swim in the river as you walk down the slope.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: Lots of space, the street is demarcated by a wall, great view (if clear view) Quiet at night, hardly any cars

title: (29649) - 7R Arrabal Sup C23
description: Parking strip in a dead end street .. quiet .. ideal for camper with trailer because the great location for motorhomes next door is forbidden to caravans (so vehicle with trailer) .. Supply and waste disposal on the site for caravans 400 meters further.

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 16 Calle Torreón
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 16 Calle Torreón
description: Nice, quiet and illuminated parking space right on the beach! Passable only for vehicles up to 3.5 tons! We stood there for a day and a night and had no problems! There are showers on the beach in the immediate vicinity, as well as toilets! However, these are locked at night! Good restaurants and bars right nearby!

title: (29109) Tolox - Carril de Tolox a Golondrina
title_short: (29109) Tolox - Carril de Tolox a Golondrina
description: Small promontory (only 3 vehicles) flat with a beautiful view of the valley. Road very little busy. Just above the football field. No water on site but there is a little lower. Close to hiking trails

title: (29109) Tolox - 104A Calle Polito
description: Water, unchlorinated and looks very clean

title: (29679) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: Roadside water source, small parking lot in front

title: (29109) Tolox - 97 Carretera Balneario
description: Spacious quiet parking. if you ask at the town hall they can provide you with electricity. Many free sources in the village. Traditional bakery 5 min. Recommended restaurants "la alberca" and "casa Lola"

title: (29108) Guaro -
description:
Great spot for a lay over, you cn park right next to the river, take a swim if you like as there is a little dam, ple tu of fish and wildlife.

There is a chiringuito/venta at the entrance selling food and drinks. Any type of vehicle can get here, it is close to the road, you can heat cars but it is very peaceful.

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 4 Arrabal Sector 13
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 4 Arrabal Sector 13
description: Large parking under shady trees keeps temperature down, quiet at night safe one night stay. Next to restaurant and mercadona supermarket down the hill. Stones throw to La Cala town centre.

title: (29100) Coín - 64 Terreno SUP.R.18
description: Large gravelled car park. Good for the night.

title: (29100) Coín - Carretera de Monda
description: Ample parking area in the center of town, with easy access to bars, restaurants and supply stores less than 5 min walk. Dirt floor, lots of dust. Quiet place to sleep during the week; bad place for holidays or weekends because you hear a lot of noise from the pub next door.

title: () Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: In the whole road you will find 3 or 4 picnic areas like this one, it does not have tables, but those of us who go by van have no problem, a shaded place (which is appreciated) and spectacular views.

title: (29109) Tolox - 29 Camino Nuevo
description: Quiet place to spend the night, somewhat level and lit. Place to start the trail of the waterfalls that is found when crossing the town, in this way it is used to enjoy the charm of Tolox

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 11 Urbanización Cerrado del Aguila
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 11 Urbanización Cerrado del Aguila
description: Super cool location. Lots of peace and a beautiful view.

title: (29100) Coín - 1Z Camino Huertas Viejas
description: Solar used to park, next to the Civil Guard barracks, near the urban center.

title: (29109) Tolox - A-7250
description: Rest area with tables, trees and offset from the road (not very busy). Nice panoramic view of Tolox and its surroundings (cannot be seen in the photos because the weather was not nice ...). No services but source nearby! About ten places horizontally.

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 39 Urbanizacion UR9
description: An easily accessible large plateau on a hill. Directly at the Castillo histórico alhaurin el grande. Please collect some garbage! There are a lot of shards and mirror splinters lying around that could cause a fire...

name: Estación de Servicio Repsol
title: (29680) Estación de Servicio Repsol
description: LPG gas refilling station

title: (29100) Coín - 1 Calle Clara Campoamor
description: Very wide parking near the city centre. A little next to the road, but you can park more inside. No facilities, but very nice!

name: Ermita San Roque
title: (29109) Ermita San Roque
description: Picnic area with 4-5 tables, very nice view of Tolox. Water source. Drinking water tap between the toilets and the Chapel. WC closed in winter

title: (29108) Guaro - 277 Diseminado Diseminados
description: At the edge of a small river at the intersection of 2 paths. Road a little dented but passable by everyone. 3/4 places near the ford very quiet ... No prohibition sign and no service against.

title: (29680) Estepona - 78734 Torrevigía
description: Una calle por debajo de selwoo aventura . se puede pernoctar sin problema y cerca del parque .. sin servicios pero muy tranquilo

title: (29100) Coín - 11 Lugar Partido las Angosturas
description: Just a big carpark, handy for Guaro and Coin,  mainly flat, by a not too busy road. local we spoke to refered to it as a fairground. Quiet at night. No services

name: Camping Parque Tropical
title: (29680) Camping Parque Tropical
description: Small, quiet and friendly place. Shady and sunny places. Pool and baby pool/covered in winter. Warm showers and sinks. 2 washing machines and 1 dryer. A few bungalows. Secret path to the beach (300m), through a tunnel under the highway. Beautiful beach. Promenade paved to Estepona. cars can be heard. Strom every 3rd place. Fill water in several places by canister. Or by hose at the entrance, where gray and black water can also be emptied. Toilet cassette at the wash house next to the dish washing places. No smell! Everything clean, hygiene rules are observed. Also feasible for larger mobile. E.g. 9m long, 3.30m high.

title: (29680) Estepona - 1 Zona Sup-C13 Torrevigía
description: Private parking of the Selwo Aventura facilities. For a fee you can spend the whole day visiting the zoo theme park.

title: (29100) Coín - 2A Avenida Reina Sofía
description: Laundrette at the Repsol garage. Small parking spaces so perhaps use car park immediately below garage.

title: (29649) - 7N Arrabal Hipodromo Costa del Sol
description: Free large and level parking. Quiet.

title: (29109) Málaga - 23 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Space for two or three caravans on a level area by the river Grande. It is alongside a small bridge and there's a tiny stone dam so you can swim. We saw three otters at night. The entrance is difficult for AC entry (motorhomes) as it is narrow and briefly very steep. But if you continue along the road upstream there are loads more pools and maybe ok for motorhomes overnight.

title: (29100) Coín - 1 Calle Guttenberg
description: Free parking for campers and caravans in the Cantarranas industrial area. The site has toilet cistern emptying, sewage disposal and water supply. The residual waste containers are located on the road above the parking lot towards the main road and on the road leading to the depot. Four supermarkets are on their way to the city within 900 meters. The city center and the "La Trocha" shopping center are both 1.5 km away.

title: (29440) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: Nice point of view

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 6 Calle El Chopo de Cosmópolis
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 6 Calle El Chopo de Cosmópolis
description: Quiet parking to spend day and night ..... in front of the beach with beach bar and shower

title: (29650) Mijas - 6J Carretera Coín
description: Van parking area. Flat, nice view. Be careful, take the lower path and go back up the esplanade in reverse.

title: (29651) Fuengirola - 99 Calle Río Guadalteba
description: Big dirt parking lot.

title: (29100) Coín - 10 Cortijo Benitez
description: Along the river there is a small gravel road with some nice spots. Cars are passing the road so be aware your not all alone there.

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 43 A-404
description: Spacious parking close to bakeries, mountains and where you can leave your motorhome

title: (29440) Igualeja - Cam. de los Anadillos
description: Bulge with a great sea view on a side street that is rarely used. Ideal for one night. Road paved, but quite narrow. Also for larger van vehicles.

title: (29650) Mijas - 8 Via Ue S24 el Cerrajon
title_short: (29650) Mijas - 8 Via Ue S24 el Cerrajon
description: Nice parking for 3 or 4 caravans, nice sunsets and right in front of hiking trails.

title: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 0 Camino de Campanales
title_short: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 0 Camino de Campanales
description: Free open space for parking large vehicles such as  motorhomes. there are almost always some parked around.

title: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 48 Arrabal L2
title_short: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 48 Arrabal L2
description: Esplanade of land with a slight slope in some parts, it is not a great place, but to spend a night without problem

title: (29651) Mijas - 21 Via Sup R1 el Acebedo
title_short: (29651) Mijas - 21 Via Sup R1 el Acebedo
description: Rustic camper stop, with all basic equipment. Showers, electric 16A. Site adjacent to restaurant/bar with WiFi, if you park nearby. Run by an enterprising young Norwegian. Easy walk to Fuengirola and the beach

title: (29100) Coín - 2 Calle Guadalquivir
description: Laundromat, gas Repsol and Cespa

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1G Urbanización la Ponderosa
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1G Urbanización la Ponderosa
description: Quiet place to spend the night and the day. People pass walking, doing sports or a car. Visit at night from various wild boars, but otherwise very peaceful and quiet. several level sites

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 19-21 Calle Jineta
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 19-21 Calle Jineta
description: Free parking with beautiful view and next to a walking path, nice to do. Very calm but with a lot of wind.

title: (29689) Estepona - 202A Diseminado la Alberdina
description: Rest area after Repsol gas station towards Malaga. With free water tap and another one for payment. If you ask for permission they let you drink for free, otherwise there is another paid tap next to it.

title: (29650) Mijas -
description: Just a tiny pull of on this beautiful road on the side of the Mijas mountain. Only room for 1 van, maybe 2. It’s right next to the road so not so quite, but amazing for a morning coffee or a lunch. Amazing view.

title: (29649) Chaparral - 10M Urbanizacion Sol del
description: Quiet place, although the highway is relatively close, you hardly hear it, plenty of space to park. The beach is just 80 meters away, with crystal clear water, great for snorkeling, you have to go through the highway through an underpass. Even last night we had several times the visit of a wild boar.

title: (29650) Mijas - 11T Urbanizacion el Maro
description:
Esplanade between the mountains and with great views of the sea.
very calm.
highly recommended.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Urbanización Prado Marina
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Urbanización Prado Marina
description: Nice, guite place, with beatufull view on the city, about 10minutes walking to the beach. Can stay throught the night with a regular car

title: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 4 Carretera Cádiz Variante
title_short: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 4 Carretera Cádiz Variante
description: It is the aquamijas parking lot, we have slept because we had the tickets for the park and we took advantage of the night to stay early. It is next to the highway but we slept very well, at night there is not so much movement. There was more camper and AC when we arrived, and no one has come to ask us. There is a sign that warns that at the opening of the park is only for customers, so it should only be used for the night.

title: (29640) Fuengirola -
description: Parking from Miramar Shopping Mall!  No service.

title: (29651) Fuengirola - 7 Calle Roble
description: Parking next to carrefour gas station right next to it. Dirt floor and very flat, quiet to spend the night with many parking spaces.

title: (29100) Miralmonte -
description: Our Wonder Casa Rural La Alegría is the ideal place where you can spend the night or several nights. Located in a privileged natural environment surrounded by nature, just 10 minutes from a shopping center (Carrefour, cinemas, etc.) and 30 minutes from the beach, airport and the tourist center of Malaga. The house has a large outdoor parking area. The private pool available throughout the year is located in a large garden with a barbecue area and a large outdoor space to enjoy. (Trampoline, basketball basket, sun loungers...) We have a washing machine and drying rack for the traveler who needs to clean their clothes with a supplement of 5 euros. Just as they can use the shower to clean themselves if they need to with an extra 3 euros. Welcome (elderly, adults, youth, adolescents, children and babies) to our rural house. Send an email to check availability.
